document_data.name: Braeder
document_data.mainbody:
'''Braeder''' was a [[gnome]] and a local hero of the village of [[Ieirithymbul]] in the [[Sword Mountains]].{{Cite dragon/252/Wyrms of the North: Palarandusk}}{{Cite web/Wyrms of the North/Palarandusk, "The Unseen Protector"}}

Braeder was the namesake of [[Braeder's Pit]], a sinkhole that swallowed up the [[Felrenden stream]] in the western edge of the Sword Mountains near Ieirithymbul, by the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
